column3: Enterprise Cloud with GitHub Actions (100 users)
Package registry storage for Docker npm Maven (200 GB)
Large file storage for binaries and assets (100 GB)
c5.2xlarge instances for Linux builds (20 runners 24x7)
GP3 SSD storage 500 GB per runner
NAT Gateway for runner internet access (2 AZs)
Outbound data transfer for artifacts and deployments (500 GB)
Application Load Balancer for runner management
Logs and metrics for runner monitoring (100 GB)
Ongoing runner infrastructure management and optimization

column4: One-time AWS migration credit for runner infrastructure
